TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProtectedMemory extends System.Object

summary.span: Proporciona métodos para proteger y desproteger la memoria.

span.span: Provides methods for protecting and unprotecting memory.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta clase proporciona acceso a la API de protección de datos (DPAPI) disponible en Windows XP y sistemas operativos posteriores.This class provides access to the Data Protection API (DPAPI) available in the Windows XP and later operating systems. Se trata de un servicio proporcionado por el sistema operativo y no se requieren otras bibliotecas.This is a service that is provided by the operating system and does not require additional libraries. Proporciona cifrado de datos confidenciales en la memoria.It provides encryption for sensitive data in memory. La clase consta de dos contenedores para la DPAPI no administrada, y .The class consists of two wrappers for the unmanaged DPAPI, and . Estos dos métodos pueden usarse para cifrar y descifrar datos en memoria.These two methods can be used to encrypt and decrypt data in memory. ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente muestra cómo usar la protección de datos.The following example shows how to use data protection. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample/CPP/memoryprotectionsample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample/CS/memoryprotectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample/vb/memoryprotectionsample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Protect (byte[] userData, System.Security.Cryptography.MemoryProtectionScope scope);
.method public static hidebysig void Protect(unsigned int8[] userData, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.MemoryProtectionScope scope) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Protect (userData As Byte(), scope As MemoryProtectionScope)
public: static void Protect(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ userData, System::Security::Cryptography::MemoryProtectionScope scope);

param.name: userData
param.span: La matriz de bytes que contiene los datos de la memoria que se van a proteger.

span.span: The byte array containing data in memory to protect.

param.span: La matriz debe ser un múltiplo de 16 bytes.

span.span: The array must be a multiple of 16 bytes.

param.name: scope
param.span: Uno de los valores de enumeración que especifica el ámbito de la protección de memoria.

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the scope of memory protection.
Protects the specified data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método puede usarse para proteger los datos en memoria.This method can be used to protect data in memory. Tenga en cuenta que el método no hace una copia de los datos, pero cifra la matriz de bytes en su lugar.Note that the method does not make a copy of the data, but encrypts the byte array in place. El `userData` parámetro debe ser de 16 bytes de longitud o un múltiplo de 16 bytes.The `userData` parameter must be 16 bytes in length or a multiple of 16 bytes. Compatibilidad con este método está disponible en Windows XP y sistemas operativos posteriores.Support for this method is available in the Windows XP and later operating systems. ## Examples El ejemplo de código siguiente muestra cómo usar la protección de datos.The following code example shows how to use data protection. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample/CPP/memoryprotectionsample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample/CS/memoryprotectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample/vb/memoryprotectionsample.vb#1)]

exception.span: debe tener una longitud de 16 bytes o múltiplo de 16.

span.span: must be 16 bytes in length or in multiples of 16 bytes.

exception.span: El sistema operativo no admite este método.

span.span: The operating system does not support this method.

exception.span: Este método sólo se puede utilizar con Windows 2000 o sistemas operativos posteriores.

span.span: This method can be used only with the Windows 2000 or later operating systems.
is .

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Unprotect (byte[] encryptedData, System.Security.Cryptography.MemoryProtectionScope scope);
.method public static hidebysig void Unprotect(unsigned int8[] encryptedData, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.MemoryProtectionScope scope) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Unprotect (encryptedData As Byte(), scope As MemoryProtectionScope)
public: static void Unprotect(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ encryptedData, System::Security::Cryptography::MemoryProtectionScope scope);

param.name: encryptedData
param.span: La matriz de bytes de la memoria que se va a desproteger.

span.span: The byte array in memory to unencrypt.

param.name: scope
param.span: Uno de los valores de enumeración que especifica el ámbito de la protección de memoria.

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the scope of memory protection.

summary.span: Desprotege los datos de la memoria que se protegieron utilizando el método .

span.span: Unprotects data in memory that was protected using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método puede utilizarse para descifrar los datos en memoria que se cifró mediante el método.This method can be used to unencrypt data in memory that was encrypted using the method. Compatibilidad con este método está disponible en Windows XP y sistemas operativos posteriores.Support for this method is available in the Windows XP and later operating systems. ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente muestra cómo usar la protección de datos.The following example shows how to use data protection. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample/CPP/memoryprotectionsample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample/CS/memoryprotectionsample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.MemoryProtectionSample/vb/memoryprotectionsample.vb#1)]

span.span: The operating system does not support this method.

exception.span: Este método sólo se puede utilizar con Windows 2000 o sistemas operativos posteriores.
